# message

**Instance Property**

The descriptive message providing details about the reason for displaying the action sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var message: String? { get }
```

## Getting Action Sheet Template Information

- **title**: The title of the action sheet.
- **actions**: The list of actions available on the action sheet.

items.description: The title of the action sheet.
items.name: title

items.description: The list of actions available on the action sheet.
items.name: actions

title: message
